scripts.prepare: if [ "$NODE_ENV" != "production" ] && [ "$NODE_ENV" != "test" ] && [ "$NODE_ENV" != "build" ]; then husky install; ln -fs $PWD/.env ./packages/ui/.env.local; fi;
scripts.test: npm run prettier:check && npm run lint
scripts.dev: concurrently -n gateway,server,repo_job,ui -c 'yellow,magenta,blue,green' 'npm run dev:graphql_gateway' 'npm run dev:graphql_server' 'npm run dev:repo_job' 'npm run dev:ui'
scripts.dev:backend: concurrently -n gateway,server,repo_job -c 'yellow,magenta,blue' 'npm run dev:graphql_gateway' 'npm run dev:graphql_server' 'npm run dev:repo_job'
scripts.dev:services: concurrently -n gateway,server -c 'yellow,magenta' 'npm run dev:graphql_gateway' 'npm run dev:graphql_server'
scripts.build: concurrently -n gateway,server,repo_job,ui -c 'yellow,magenta,blue,green' 'npm run build:graphql_gateway' 'npm run build:graphql_server' 'npm run build:repo_job' 'npm run dev:ui'
scripts.build:backend: concurrently -n gateway,server,repo_job -c 'yellow,magenta,blue' 'npm run build:graphql_gateway' 'npm run build:graphql_server' 'npm run build:repo_job'
scripts.build:services: concurrently -n gateway,server -c 'yellow,magenta' 'npm run build:graphql_gateway' 'npm run build:graphql_server'
scripts.serve: concurrently -n gateway,server,ui -c 'yellow,magenta,green' 'sleep 2 && npm run serve:graphql_gateway' 'npm run serve:graphql_server' 'npm run serve:ui'
scripts.serve:services: concurrently -n gateway,server -c 'yellow,magenta' 'sleep 2 && npm run serve:graphql_gateway' 'npm run serve:graphql_server'
scripts.lint: concurrently -n gateway,server,repo_job,ui -c 'yellow,magenta,blue,green' 'npm run lint -w graphql_gateway' 'npm run lint -w graphql_server' 'npm run lint -w repo_job' 'npm run lint -w ui'
scripts.lint:backend: concurrently -n gateway,server,repo_job -c 'yellow,magenta,blue' 'npm run lint -w graphql_gateway' 'npm run lint -w graphql_server' 'npm run lint -w repo_job'
scripts.lint:services: concurrently -n gateway,server -c 'yellow,magenta' 'npm run lint -w graphql_gateway' 'npm run lint -w graphql_server'
